HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.saveChanges: Save and see your changes instantly.

hero.badge: Smarter Tests. Faster Grading. Better Learning.
hero.title:
Smarter Tests.
Faster Grading.
<highlight>Better Learning.</highlight>
hero.subtitle: Checkmate helps teachers handle routine tasks so they can focus on what truly matters - their students.
hero.getStartedTooltip: Checkmate is currently in development - try our free demo today for an exclusive preview of what's coming soon!
hero.comingSoonTooltip: We're working hard to bring Checkmate to life! The platform is currently under development and will be available soon.

features.title: Why Checkmate?
features.subtitle: Teaching is complex. We make it simpler.

benefit1.title: Save hours of work each week
benefit1.description: Automate routine grading tasks and focus on what matters most.

benefit2.title: Analyze student progress in one click
benefit2.description: Get instant insights into student performance and class trends.

benefit3.title: Help every student reach their full potential
benefit3.description: Provide personalized feedback and guidance for each learner.

aiTestGeneration.title: Create tests instantly
aiTestGeneration.description: Generate complete, high-quality tests from your own materials. No templates, no repetition.

automatedGrading.title: Automatic grading
automatedGrading.description: Checkmate grades student responses in seconds, identifies common mistakes, and provides clear explanations for every question.

studentInsights.title: Results & Analytics
studentInsights.description: Visualize trends across students and classes. Discover who's excelling, who needs help, and where your teaching can adapt.

personalAiTutor.title: Smart Study Assistant
personalAiTutor.description: Helps students learn smarter with clear explanations and gentle guidance.

interactiveResults.title: Interactive Results
interactiveResults.description: Access your test results through a personalized link with detailed explanations and improvement suggestions.

studyMaterials.title: Study Materials
studyMaterials.description: Receive curated study materials and practice questions based on your performance and learning goals.

features.sectionTitle: From making tests to helping students

howItWorks.title: Simple. Powerful. Teacher-friendly.
howItWorks.subtitle: Checkmate integrates seamlessly into your existing workflow.

generateTest.title: Create a Test
generateTest.description: Upload your lesson materials or describe what you need - Checkmate's AI builds a test that matches your content and objectives.

printDistribute.title: Print or Share
printDistribute.description: Distribute the test digitally or on paper - whatever works best for your class.

aiEvaluation.title: Let AI Do the Grading
aiEvaluation.description: Once collected, Checkmate automatically evaluates every response and highlights key patterns.

personalizedLearning.title: Guide Personalized Learning
personalizedLearning.description: Students receive individualized feedback, explanations, and adaptive practice questions.

aboutUs.title: Meet the Team
aboutUs.subtitle: The minds behind Checkmate.
aboutUs.description: We're a young Czech team passionate about helping teachers do their best work.
aboutUs.collaboration: Backed by investors and innovators who share our mission, we're developing Checkmate in close collaboration with Czech educators.

achievement.title: First Place at BlockJam Hackathon
achievement.description: Our journey began at the BlockJam Hackathon, where Checkmate won first place for its potential to transform education through AI.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Four professional developers from STRV passionate about transforming education through technology.

sponsorship.title: Our Partners
sponsorship.description: With support from Theta Network, AWS, and BlockJam, we're bringing smarter education technology to life.

cta.title: Try the demo
cta.subtitle: Checkmate is currently in development, try our free demo to see what's coming soon!
cta.footerSubtitle: Help us build a tool for real classrooms.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates on AI in education and platform features.

signIn.title: Welcome back
signIn.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue

signUp.title: Create your account
signUp.subtitle: Sign up to get started with CheckMate.ink

verifyEmail.subtitle: We sent a verification code to

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

screen.description: Manage your students and their information.

emptyState.title: No students yet
emptyState.description: Get started by adding your first student to begin managing your classroom.

add.title: Add New Student
add.description: Enter the student's information to add them to your class.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number

screen.description: Manage your groups and organize your students.

emptyState.title: No groups yet
emptyState.description: Get started by creating your first group to organize your students.

add.title: Add New Group
add.description: Enter the group information to create a new group.

students.label: Students
students.placeholder: Select students to add to this group

emptyState.title: No tests yet
emptyState.description: Get started by creating your first test to assess your students.

add.title: Create New Test
add.description: Follow the steps to create a comprehensive test assessment.

edit.title: Edit Test
edit.description: Follow the steps to update the test information.

basic.title: Basic Info
basic.description: Enter the test name and description.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Configure the test subject, topic, age range, and difficulty.

questions.title: Questions
questions.description: Set the question format, count, and timing.

content.title: Test Questions
content.noQuestions: No questions added yet. Click "Add Question" to get started.

lockTestConfirm.title: Are you sure you want to lock this test?
lockTestConfirm.description: Once locked, this test cannot be edited anymore. Students will be able to take this test and results can be uploaded for evaluation. This action cannot be undone.

uploadResults.title: Upload Results
uploadResults.description: Upload images of completed test papers for AI evaluation.

trigger.title: Upload listing images
trigger.subtitle: Click here or drag and drop to upload

loadFailed.title: Failed to load test
loadFailed.description: There was an error loading your test. Please try again.

draft.title: AI is preparing your test
draft.description: This test is currently being prepared for AI evaluation

pin.title: Enter PIN to View Results
pin.subtitle: Please enter your 6-digit PIN code to access your test results
pin.invalidPin: Invalid PIN code. Please try again.

view.title: Your Test Results
view.subtitle: Review your performance and see detailed feedback

hero.title: Generate Tests in <highlight>Seconds</highlight>
hero.subtitle: Describe what you need and watch our AI create a complete, high-quality test tailored to your requirements.

form.tryItOut: ✨ Try it out! Generate your first test

topic.label: Topic
topic.placeholder: e.g., Linear Equations, World War II

options.THETA_ON_DEMAND: Theta On Demand - Fastest, lower quality
options.CLAUDE_HAIKU_3: Claude Haiku 3 - Balanced speed and quality
options.GEMINI_2_5_FLASH_LITE: Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite - Fast and efficient
options.GEMINI_3_FLASH_PREVIEW: Gemini 3 Flash Preview - Latest preview version

promptInput.placeholder:
Describe the test you want to create...

For example: "Create a 10-question multiple choice test about World War II for high school students, difficulty level intermediate"

examples.subtitle: Click any example to get started quickly

preview.title: Your Generated Test
preview.subtitle: Review and customize your test below
preview.previewPlaceholder: This is where your generated test will appear once the API integration is complete. The test will include all questions, answer choices, and be ready for use in your classroom.
preview.apiNotice: API integration coming soon - this is a UI preview showing how your generated test will be displayed.
preview.subject: Subject

loading.title: Creating Your Test
loading.subtitle: Our AI is working on your custom test. This usually takes 10-30 seconds.
loading.tip: Your test will include 10 carefully crafted questions with detailed explanations.

feedback.title: How was the generated test?
